title: Sentimental Darling
alternative_title: センチメンタル・ダーリン
status: センチメンタル・ダーリン
description:
Description :
        **Sentimental Darling**Ryosuke and Shun are in their fourth year of college and have been dating for five years. They've been happy together every day, and it's been smooth sailing... but lately, even when they've had sex, it's just been "good work". I want to cherish our time together! I want us to be more intimate! So Ryosuke decides to make a plan...?**Sentimental Boy**Ryosuke and Shun have known each other since they were children, and they've taken it for granted that they'll always be together. But one day, Sun confessed to Ryosuke about his unexpected feelings for him!Also includes Come Here Neko-san, to the Clapping Hands (Neko-san Kochira, Te no Naru Hou e)(Source: Kasakura Shuppansha, translated)

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5: Come Here Neko-San, To The Clapping Hands
